title: MATE
author: Ali Hazelwood
description: To help stave off her enemies, Serena Paris, a Human-Were hybrid, forms a partnership with Koen Alexander.

title: THE INTRUDER
author: Freida McFadden
description: During a rough storm, Casey puts herself in danger when she lets a girl, who is covered in blood, into her cabin.

title: THE SECRET OF SECRETS
author: Dan Brown
description: As he searches for the missing noetic scientist he has been seeing, Robert Langdon discovers something regarding a secret project.

title: CRY HAVOC
author: Jack Carr
description: During a time of war and civil unrest in 1968, the Navy SEAL Tom Reece is given an unofficial and dangerous mission.

title: TWICE
author: Mitch Albom
description: Alfie Logan, who was gifted with the ability to live any moment a second time but must accept the outcomes, makes a risky love decision.

title: HOW TO TEST NEGATIVE FOR STUPID
author: John Kennedy
description: The Republican senator from Louisiana shares stories about politics in Washington, D.C., and in his home state.

title: LAST RITES
author: Ozzy Osbourne with Chris Ayres
description: The late heavy metal icon charts his health difficulties and his return for the Back to the Beginning concert.

title: 107 DAYS
author: Kamala Harris
description: The former vice president recounts her abbreviated campaign to become president in 2024.

title: HOSTAGE
author: Eli Sharabi
description: Sharabi, who spent 491 days in Hamas captivity, recounts his story of survival.

title: POEMS & PRAYERS
author: Matthew McConaughey
description: The actor and author of “Greenlights” explores elements of belief and reason that make up our lives.

title: WAR GAMES
author: Alan Gratz
description: During the 1936 Olympic Games, a young American gymnast is recruited to rob a Nazi bank. (Ages 4 to 8)

title: THE COURT OF THE DEAD
author: Rick Riordan and Mark Oshiro
description: Nico, Will and Hazel delve into the mysterious disappearances of monsters at Camp Jupiter. (Ages 10 to 14)

title: THE RISE OF NEPTUNE
author: Scott Reintgen
description: Lunar and Dread defend Mars against dragons from Neptune. (Ages 10 and up)

title: THE COMPLETE COOKBOOK FOR YOUNG CHEFS
author: America's Test Kitchen Kids
description: Over 100 kid-tested recipes from America's Test Kitchen. (Ages 8 and up)

title: TROUBLING TONSILS!
author: Aaron Reynolds. Illustrated Peter Brown
description: Charlie Marmot's infected tonsils have disappeared before surgery! (Ages 6 to 9)

title: HOW TO CATCH A WITCH
author: Alice Walstead. Illustrated Megan Joyce
description: The Catch Club Kids attempt to snare a witch on Halloween. (Ages 4 to 7)

title: THE LEAF THIEF
author: Alice Hemming. Illustrated Nicola Slater
description: Squirrel attempts to figure out who has stolen his leaves. (Ages 4 to 8)

title: HOW TO CATCH A MONSTER
author: Adam Wallace. Illustrated Andy Elkerton
description: A boy attempts to catch the monster in his closet. (Ages 4 to 8)

title: CREEPY PAIR OF UNDERWEAR
author: Aaron Reynolds. Illustrated Peter Brown
description: Jasper Rabbit deals with a pair of glowing underwear that won't go away. (Ages 4 to 8)

title: HOW TO CATCH A UNICORN
author: Adam Wallace. Illustrated Andy Elkerton
description: Children attempt to capture the mythical creature. (Ages 4 to 8)

title: THE HUNGER GAMES
author: Suzanne Collins
description: In a dystopia, a girl fights for survival on live TV. (Ages 12 and up)

title: THE TWILIGHT SAGA
author: Stephenie Meyer
description: Vampires and werewolves and their intrigues in high school. (Ages 12 and up)

title: SPY SCHOOL
author: Stuart Gibbs
description: In a case of mistaken identity, a boy is recruited into a junior C.I.A. academy. (Ages 8 to 12)

title: HARRY POTTER
author: J.K. Rowling
description: A wizard hones his conjuring skills in the service of fighting evil. (Ages 10 and up)

title: DIARY OF A WIMPY KID
author: Jeff Kinney. Illustrated Jeff Kinney
description: The travails and challenges of adolescence. (Ages 9 to 12)

title: FAKE SKATING
author: Lynn Painter
description: After years of separation, the childhood friends Alec and Dani reunite and face their true feelings toward each other. (Ages 14 and up)

title: BITTEN
author: Jordan Stephanie Gray
description: Vanessa seeks vengeance against the werewolves who attacked her and changed her life forever. (Ages 14 to 18)

title: HOUR OF THE PUMPKIN QUEEN
author: Megan Shepherd
description: After a potion demonstration goes awry, Sally and Luna fall through a portal to Time Town. (Ages 12 and up)

title: THORN SEASON
author: Kiera Azar
description: In the Kingdom of Daradon, where wielding magic is treason, Alissa Paine must conceal her magical abilities or face persecution. (Ages 14 and up)

title: IMMORTAL CONSEQUENCES
author: I.V. Marie
description: At Blackwood Academy, six students compete to change their fate in a cutthroat magical competition called the Decennial. (Ages 14 and up)
